ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Hate (was:RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate  weapon?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like from his account that the elves in E Commons were mostly Feir Dal, but there was at least one good aligned dark elf among them. Apparently they
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds like from his account that the elves in E Commons were mostly
Feir'Dal, but there was at least one 'good' aligned dark elf among them.
Apparently they and several other servants of Tunare in Kithicor were slain
very early on in the event. Apparently they were trying to tell the 'good'
aligned PC's something, but I'm not sure they got the chance. At least one
person of a good aligned race of high level was instrumental in slaying some
of these 'good' npc's. Apparently a druid or two dedicated to Tunare
actually killed their own fellows and earned the wrath of several other GM's
(instant death) as far as I can tell from guild reports there was no
retribution on 'evil' pc's who were killing the 'good' npc's, only on those
who did not role-play their allegiances accurately.

Anyone been in Kithicor since? I am very curious what I will wake up to
find there and how I will escape level 40+ mobs when I am camped about dead
center of the zone.

Kitasi of E'ci
Somewhere in Kithicor?
May Marr protect me!
